messages.subject: Charleston, SC dealer
messages.msgSnippet: A couple of years ago I was in the Charleston, SC antiques district and ran across a weapons dealer with an impressive collection of Japanese blades and tsuba.
messages.messageBody:
A couple of years ago I was in the Charleston, SC antiques district
and ran across a weapons dealer with an impressive collection of
Japanese blades and tsuba. However, I cannot remember the name of the
shop. Can anyone point me in the right direction? Thanks for any help.
